# Download training data
train = pd.read_csv('/kaggle/input/ammonium-prediction-in-river-water/train.csv')
train = train.drop(['Id','3','4','5','6','7'], axis = 1)
train = train.dropna().reset_index(drop=True)
train.info()
source.8cd9cf8b: ## This is a blank for the workshop tasks for library: Numpy, Pandas and Matplotlib
source.4313397e:
Dataset to has data about the water quality at the upper part of the river Pivdenny Bug (first 200 km from 809 km) for 1997-2019.

Target is the water quality in the river crossection with the water intake of the Vinnytsia city.
